type.description: The type of the event, always `response.mcp_call.in_progress`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

item_id.description: The ID of the tool call item that was updated.

title: Response MCP call in progress event
description: A streaming event that indicated an MCP call was in progress.
